quagga.input.subject: FVP / EPC and exhibits (execution versions)
quagga.input.body:
Kay--As you requested, I am sending you the final version of the FVP EPC 
contract and exhibits.
---------------------- Forwarded by Alan Larsen/PDX/ECT on 01/23/2001 09:24 
AM ---------------------------


"SANDY COFER" <SCOFER@LLGM.COM> on 01/23/2001 12:24:26 PM
To: <Sheila.Tweed@enron.com>, <SUZANNE.adams@enron.com>
cc: <Alan.Larsen@enron.com>, <david.marshall@enron.com>, 
<ed.dannhaus@enron.com>, <ehearn@enron.com>, <Jake.Thomas@enron.com>, 
<Jeff.G.Slaughter@enron.com>, <JOHN.g.rigby@enron.com>, 
<JOHN.normand@enron.com>, <John.Schwartzenburg@enron.com>, 
<JUDE.rolfes@enron.com>, <larry.leib@enron.com>, <mgocker@enron.com>, 
<SHIRLEY.oliver@enron.com>, "JOHN G KLAUBERG" <JKLAUBER@LLGM.COM>, "JOHN 
MAAS" <JMAAS@LLGM.COM>, "THOMAS CONSTANTINE" <TCONSTAN@LLGM.COM>, "THOMAS J. 
MOORE" <TMOORE@LLGM.COM>, <DAVIDlu@nepco.com>, <GENEl@nepco.com>, 
<kenr@nepco.com> 

Subject: FVP / EPC and exhibits (execution versions)


Sheila --

As requested, attached are execution versions of the EPC contract and exhibit 
file.  I am sending the execution version of the Scope of Work under separate 
email due to the size of the file.

Sandy Cofer
LeBoeuf, Lamb, Greene & MacRae
633 17th St., Suite 2000
Denver, CO 80202
303-291-2717
scofer@llgm.com

This e-mail, including attachments, contains information that
is confidential and it may be protected by the attorney/client
or other privileges.  This e-mail, including attachments, constitutes
non-public information intended to be conveyed only to the
designated recipient(s).  If you are not an intended recipient,
please delete this e-mail, including attachments, and notify me
by return mail, e-mail or at 303-291-2717.  The unauthorized use,
dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this e-mail, including
attachments, is prohibited and may be unlawful.

 - FVP EPC EXHIBITS execution version.doc
 - FVP EPC execution version.doc
